summary: An innkeeper murders a wealthy guest to pay off his debt, but his conscience will not allow him to get away with the crime so easily.
cast: Lionel Barrymore|Caroline Frances Cooke|Gustav von Seyffertitz|Lorimer Johnston|Eddie Phillips|Lola Todd|Laura La Varnie|Boris Karloff|E. Alyn Warren|Frank Austin|John George|Otto Lederer
title: The Bells
